node.name: Expedition Camping tent(6 Person) MAKE: PRAKAL
node.description: The premium quality expedition tent with capacity to in house the team of 6 members under above average rough conditions like snow. Water resistant polyester fabric and fiberglass material frames makes the tent stiff enough to take heavy wind, rain and snowfall. (SIZE: 1800x1800x900mm / WEIGHT: 2.1 Kg)
node.content:
1. Selection of material for every component of this tent is done by expert mountaineers.
2. Factors like cold & heat through the ground is also overcome through an insulation sheet of polyethylene.
3. Fiberglass frames which are the skeleton of the tent can hold the weight of snow and pressure of heavy rain and these premium quality frames are lightweight so that carry easily.
4. Some special features are also catered in design like ventilation & mosquito mesh.
5. This ventilation mesh also helps to bypass the heavy wind from the top at the time of countering extreme conditions.
6. All setup is compacted under one bag packaging with two sides carry system of the bag.
7. This tent is suitable for altitude hiking, small expedition, snow camping, and family picnic.
node.alt: Prakal Tents for Camping 6 Person,Instant Pop Up Tents for Camping, Beach Tents for Family,Folding Waterproof Tent for Outdoor Camping

node.name: Base Camping tent(3 +1 Person) MAKE: COLEMAN
node.description: Base camp tent for climbers which has space for (3+1) persons, 100% waterproof with anti-grip property of tent material towards snow. Medium large flysheet is extra space for cooking and placing baggage. (SIZE: 3300x1800x1200mm / WEIGHT: 2.5 Kg)
node.content:
1. An American brand that is known for the best outdoor recreation products, came up with this base camp tent that can lay (3+1) persons i.e. 3 off-grid climbers or expeditions, and 1 person to stay at base camp as supporting staff. 
2. Tent materials are subjected to numerous tests under the guidelines of experience & veteran climbers.
3. Upper layer of the tent has an anti-grip property that skids the snow due to its own weight. 
4. Flysheet(fabric cover pitched outside and over a tent to give extra protection) covers enough space for cooking under small flames of fire. 
5. Dimension: 3300mm x 1800mm x 1200mm (Main Tent) and 500mm x 190mm x 190mm (Flysheet). 
6. Net weight of the entire tent equipment is under 5Kg which is as per standard norms of professional climbers.
node.alt: Coleman Darwin 3 Plus Dome Tent, 3 Man Camping Tent with Fibreglass Poles, 3000 mm Water Column, Waterproof

node.name: Trekking Camping tent(3 Person) MAKE: QUECHUA
node.description: An international product, with 2 years warranty, for regular and professional trekkers that is built to stand against any weather condition. With space for 3 persons & material tested in real time adverse conditions of tallest mountains of world. (SIZE: 1800x1000x900mm / WEIGHT: 1.5 Kg)
node.content:
1. Team of French mountaineers & material technicians came up with this tent design, while simplicity is the first principle to cut short the lifting weight for regular campers and professional trekkers.
2. Only basic improvements are implemented like flysheet(fabric cover pitched outside and over a tent to give extra protection) and ventilation at back.
3. Dome shape helps to control the overall weight of entire tent equipment under 1/5 Kg which is good for professionals to carry the extra weight of food & other means.
4. Besides being an imported product its cost is under reasonable range for individuals who love long term investment, 2 years warranty is also provided.
5. To reduce the environmental impact, the maker decided to dye every other thread of rope and also they assembled the entire tent in one hook bag.
